name: JSX ‚ÄúPrivate Jet‚Äù full experience (Spoiler: INCREDIBLE!) Houston-Hobby to Dallas-Love
description:
Get Surfshark VPN at http://surfshark.deals/winginit - Enter promo code WINGINIT for 83% off and, a special deal over the holiday season - now FOUR EXTRA MONTHS for free!

Well, this is something different! JSX are a boutique airline running 30-seat Embraer 135 and 145 aircraft on several routes. I flew Houston Hobby to Dallas Love and I was blown away by the efficiency and smooth service, which just has to be been to be believed! It is amazingly cool to fly something close to a "private" jet...
